span.b: SCHOOL CLOSURE EXTENDED TO END OF SCHOOL YEAR

If you are a senior 65 or older living in Bastrop County and need assistance getting food, please call the Bastrop County Local Governments COVID-19 Hotline at 512-303-4300. You will need to provide your name, address, and phone number.

span.span: It is the policy of the McDade Independent School District not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, disability or age in its employment or in providing education or access to benefits of educational services, activities, and programs.
Questions or issues concerning discrimination on these basis should be directed to one of our Title IX coordinators:
